snippet.title: Anthology Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
www.anthologygame.com / http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=855397700

Anthology is an upcoming PC adventure game by Lewis Denby (Richard & Alice, Sepulchre), with Khaled Makhshoush and Francisco Gonzalez (A Golden Wake, Ben Jordan, Lamplight City) on art and animation.

Trailer music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
